extendedInfo.description: Police Scanner Radio brings you more than 2,500 police, fire, rescue and other radio feeds over 3G or WiFi. You can search for channels in the U.S. and other countries by country, state or province and county. Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G/WiFi triangulation. You can save your favorites, listen in the background, and get instant access to new feeds as they come online. Use it to monitor exciting police, fire, and rescue frequencies, stay abreast of these activities in your area, and be prepared for disasters or other emergency situations. â It's like Jersey Shore, but not really. â Whether you like reality shows or hate them, you'll love listening in on real police, fire and rescue communications. Police Radio brings you more than 2,000 channels including public safety, air traffic, marine and amateur short-wave frequencies, all easily searchable. â Find sources close to you. â When you could hear your neighbors yelling over your own TV, you knew what they were up to. It's when they suddenly got quiet that you had to wonder. No more! With Police Radio, you'll know as soon as the authorities do! â Never boring! â Find channels with the most activity and listeners. Search U.S. feeds by state and county. Also search international feeds. Roger, Porkchop. Whut's yer 20? Learn new words, and new ways of combining familiar words. We were going to list this in the Education category, but everyone laughed. So here it is in this category. Seriously, though, check out the features: Critical Hit Software LLC makes no claim of any kind about the availability of any specific communications channel, frequency or data feed. Feeds are added and removed from time to time outside the control of Critical Hit Software LLC. Please see http://criticalhitsoftware.com/scanner_feeds.php for a sample list of feeds. FEATURES â More than 2,500 radio feeds delivered to you over 3G or WiFi â Simple, intuitive screens â Search U.S. and international channels by country, state and county â Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G triangulation â Save your favorite channels â Listen in the background as you use other apps â Get instant access as new feeds come online

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Works great... I got to listen to the whole conversation as a shoplifter got arrested right behind me today lol

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Nicely done. Great UI, simple to understand and very informative. Great job.

reviews.comment: More than amazing fantabulous (fantastic and fabulous put together)

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great app. Easy to use interface with a crisp clean feel to it. Lots of frequencies to choose from. A must have spoof you like scanners!
reviews.author: Nagaru Hatsumi

reviews.title: Police scanner app
reviews.comment: Awesome app keeps me well informed especially since my home scanner doesn\'t work anymore. When you just need to know.. great job..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Police scanner
reviews.comment: I have reviewed and tried almost all the police scanner aps and matched them with my digital radio.  None come near to the number of stations in this ap. I even get DC police which no other ap gets.  5 stars. Great job.
reviews.author: Basil Nikas

reviews.title: Was fine until...
reviews.comment: They started inturupting with an upgrade...which u either have to buy or download a worthless app..uninstalled.
reviews.author: saba kaid

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: The app works good,  just wish I could receive broadcasts from my local area instead of ones that are 100 miles away. I\'m sure the app could use a little tweeking. Thanks to theppl who create these apps . My hats off to you.
reviews.author: Jimmy Murderer

reviews.title: Festis
reviews.comment: Works on hughes net when scanner radio will not. Needs channel seperation for left and right feeds. Keeps asking for upgrade, after free upgrade was given
reviews.author: Charlie Franco

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The best app you can download. Will download more apps from this developer.
reviews.author: Jonathan Tallant

reviews.title: This app SUXS!!!
reviews.comment: Every freaking minute it stops to ask u to upgrade!! DONT WASTE UR TIME OR THE SPACE ON UR PHONE!!! WTH!!!! THIS IS SUPPOSED TO BE A FREE APP!!! I will rate it a 5 if y\'all would eliminate the constant asking to upgrade!!!! UNINSTALLING!!!!

reviews.title: Great50 scanner
reviews.comment: The PoliceScanner is a great app which is fast and on, y tablet doesnt slow ot down one bit. I use ot all the time so I knpw wjat is what in my neck of the woods.

reviews.title: Keeps you hanging
reviews.comment: Even before the end of the call it brings up the upgrade and rating page which cuts the call  i dont mind ads can\'t stand there way. Can you guess!what app I\'m going to uninstall! Bye

reviews.comment: Well worth listening too. Agood selection of countries which will be intetesting to a variety of people

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I love this app. It has a variety of radio channels from around the country and around the world.

reviews.title: To much ads
reviews.comment: This is a good app. However, to many commercials intrupting transmissions. Other services has commercials but do not intrupt. They need to fix this issue. Until then, I will use another scanner service.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Big thumbs up for real live radios from around the world!  Only issue is that some channels won\'t play, but still lots that do
